markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Phantom Prison](/Spells.aspx?ID=969)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Haborym](/Deities.aspx?ID=527), [Shivaska](/Deities.aspx?ID=436)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 50 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
Will

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You completely surround a Large or smaller creature in immobile illusory walls, trapping it inside a false prison it can't escape. No other creatures see or feel these walls, and the target can't see anything outside of the illusory walls. The target can attempt a Will save when the spell is cast, each time it attempts to interact with or escape the walls, and each time something from outside the walls affects the target. On a success, it [disbelieves](/Rules.aspx?ID=267) the illusion and the spell ends.

---
**Heightened (8th)** You can target up to 5 creatures.
name: Phantom Prison

---

<summary>
Trap a creature in illusory walls until it disbelieves.
</summary>
summary: Trap a creature in illusory walls until it disbelieves.

No other creatures see or feel these walls, and the target can't see anything outside of the illusory walls. The target can attempt a Will save when the spell is cast, each time it attempts to interact with or escape the walls, and each time something from outside the walls affects the target. On a success, it disbelieves the illusion and the spell ends. --- Heightened (8th) You can target up to 5 creatures.
